body_html: Thanks for your answer. ctx.mark_dirty is missing from the documentation, but anyway my use of in-place assignment is probably too particular. Thanks for the tip on resize, edited accordingly. I will try this again on the next release.
body_text: Thanks for your answer. ctx.mark_dirty is missing from the documentation, but anyway my use of in-place assignment is probably too particular. Thanks for the tip on resize, edited accordingly. I will try this again on the next release.
body: Thanks for your answer. `ctx.mark_dirty` is missing from the documentation, but anyway my use of in-place assignment is probably too particular. Thanks for the tip on `resize`, edited accordingly. I will try this again on the next release.
